<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/samplecontexttracker/#ac617e33450ffda81e4b830543674abbf"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionsamples">FunctionSamples</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/samplecontexttracker/#a0b4a3e47e33b66648a8b870f6182c1f2">SampleContextTracker::getBaseSamplesFor</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionid">FunctionId</a> Name,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MergeContext) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Getting base profile for function: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Name &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Base profile is top-level node (child of root node), so try to retrieve</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// existing top-level node for given function first. If it exists, it could be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that we&#39;ve merged base profile before, or there&#39;s actually context-less</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// profile from the input (e.g. due to unreliable stack walking).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/contexttrienode">ContextTrieNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> = getTopLevelContextNode(Name);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MergeContext) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;  Merging context profile into base profile: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Name</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have profile for function under different contexts,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// create synthetic base profile and merge context profiles</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into base profile.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;CSamples : FuncToCtxtProfiles&#91;Name&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/samplecontext">SampleContext</a> &amp;Context = CSamples-&gt;getContext();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip inlined context profile and also don&#39;t re-merge any context</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Context.hasState(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a6cff5a57b476680e6b28e4dbfd2da8aca0639979a0b27bb1cd0e0d94784fd3285">InlinedContext</a>) || Context.hasState(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a6cff5a57b476680e6b28e4dbfd2da8aca341f13af8fa5d6c42e361bcf419abcff">MergedContext</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FromNode == <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> || <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> == &amp;ToNode) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expect only one base profile&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
